casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Charles Michael CASSELL, III. No. 456P03-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 4, 2004. Barbara S. Blackman, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Charles Cassell, III. Jeffrey R. Edwards, Assistant Attorney General, Garry W. Frank, District Attorney, for State.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 30th day of January 2004 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 4th day of March 2004."
